title: Getting Dirty With Fabien Ziegler of Drew Estate
itunes:title: Getting Dirty With Fabien Ziegler of Drew Estate
description:
David Garofalo has a long history with Drew Estate a history that dates back to their beginnings as he hosted one of their first ever events at Two Guys Smoke Shop. Today we welcome Fabien Ziegler to the show as we find out whats new and exciting from Drew Estate.

The man known as Dirty Fabien will join us for the full two hours as we light up the Undercrown Maduro in the first hour, a cigar that is part of the care package.

In the second hour we light up the Two Guys Smoke Shop exclusive Acid Amigos as well as let you know about a special promotion running until November 3rd.

We will have the usual suspects such as Versus, Offer Of The Day, Asylum, Classic 3-Way and Cigar News on the number one downloaded cigar podcast in the world.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
